activities: Socialcast receives, processes or contemplates processing EEA and Swiss personal data relating to: 1)  representatives and employees of actual and prospective corporate customers and business partners; 2) representatives and employees of actual and prospective vendors and suppliers; 3) individuals whose data Socialcast processes on behalf of business customers as a service provider; 5)  technical and configuration data (to the extent that it is consider personal data) from customer and end user computers, servers, devices and peripherals; 6) personal data which a customer or end user may place in the product or service; 7) customer and end user behavioral data associated with the use of products or services; 8) personal data received as part of providing support services.
corpofftitle1: Senior VP & General Counsel of VMware
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online, off-line and manually processed customer, customers' end users, prospect, supplier, vendor, and partner data
recoursemech: If you have questions or concerns regarding this statement, you should first contact us at privacy@socialcast.com. If you do not receive acknowledgement of your inquiry or your inquiry has not been satisfactorily addressed, you should contact TRUSTe at: https://feedback-form.truste.com/watchdog/request TRUSTe will then serve as a liaison with us to resolve your concerns. You can contact us by writing or emailing us at the address below: Socialcast 501 Second St., Suite 700 San Francisco, CA 94107 Email: privacy@socialcast.com
